resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82443</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82443</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4350</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Nim</string>
            <string language="en">Nim ( to steal)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nim (stehlen)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nim (pour voler)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nim (para roubar)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nim (per rubare)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Nim (για να κλέψει)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nim (robar)</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Spill mot programmet. Hver spiller (du og programmet) kan fjerne 1 eller 2 fyrstikker hver gang. Den som må ta den siste fyrstikken har tapt.</string>
            <string language="en">Play agianst the computer.Each player( the program or you) can remove one or two sticks each time.The player having to remove the last one looses.</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel agianst das computer.Each player(das 
Programm oder Sie) kann ein oder zwei Stöcke löschen jeder müssende
time.The Spieler das letzte löschen löst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'agianst de jeu le player(de computer.Each le 
programme ou vous) peut retirer un ou deux bâtons chaque joueur de 
time.The devant retirer dernier desserre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O agianst do jogo o player(de computer.Each o 
programa ou você) pode remover um ou duas varas cada jogador de 
time.The que tem que remover último afrouxam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il agianst del gioco il player(di computer.Each 
il programma o voi) può rimuovere uno o due bastone ogni giocatore di
time.The che deve rimuovere quello ultimo si slaccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι agianst ο υπολογιστής Κάθε 
player(to πρόγραμμα ή εσείς) μπορεί να αφαιρέσει ένα ή δύο 
ραβδιά κάθε χρόνος Ο φορέας που πρέπει να αφαιρέσει τον 
τελευταίο χαλαρώνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El agianst del juego el player(de computer.Each el
programa o usted) puede quitar uno o dos palillos cada jugador de 
time.The que tiene que quitar el pasado sueltan.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
